properties.Name: CustomerAssociation
properties.Description: The one or more Association(s) in which the customer participates or belongs.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: AssociationId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Association.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated data is effective or 'as-of'.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated data is effective or 'as-of'.

Columns.Name: CustomerAssociationNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Customer/Association relationship.
